resources.string: Akshit Jain is the Student Experience Lead at Udacity. He always comes up with great ideas and surprises for everyone. He is a really good friend and mentor alike who is always ready to help.
Geetanjali is the student moderator of #git_github channel on Slack. She always comes up with new challenges and tasks for everyone. She is a very good speaker and is confident in whatever she does.
Karthikeyan is the student moderator on Slack. He has amazing skills and is always ready to help no matter the time.

Lakshit is a very dedicated person towards his goal. He has amazing skills and is always doing something or the other. He is always available if I get stuck anywhere and provides instant and great solutions.
